title: Run Tasks in Background
description: Learn to run long-running commands in the background while continuing to work.

initialFiles.content:
# Challenge: Run Tasks in Background

Learn to run long-running tasks in the background.

## Objectives
1. Start a long-running build process in the background
2. Continue working on other tasks while it runs
3. Check on the background task's progress

objectives.description: Create a new file while build runs

hints.text: Ask Claude to run a command in the background. Use the run_in_background parameter.
Try: 'Run npm run build in the background, then while it's running, create src/utils.js with a helper function'

Ask: 'Start npm run build in the background. While it runs, create src/utils.js with a formatDate helper. Then create workflow.md explaining how background tasks let you work on multiple things concurrently.'

solution.approach: Run long tasks in background, continue with other work, check results later.
solution.example: Run build in background while creating other files

learningPoints: Background tasks run without blocking your work
Use for builds, tests, and long-running processes
Check on background tasks when needed
